general.title: General Settings
general.helper: Card metadata, background, language, and update cadence.

entities.title: Entity Selection
entities.helper: Choose the PV, battery, grid, load, and EV entities used by the card. Either the PV total sensor or your PV string arrays need to be specified as a minimum.

colors.title: Color & Thresholds
colors.helper: Configure grid thresholds and accent colours for flows and EV display.

typography.title: Typography
typography.helper: Fine tune the font sizes used across the card.

card_title.label: Card Title
card_title.helper: Title displayed at the top of the card. Leave blank to disable.

display_unit.label: Display Unit
display_unit.helper: Unit used when formatting power values.

update_interval.label: Update Interval
update_interval.helper: Refresh cadence for card updates (0 disables throttling).

animation_speed_factor.label: Animation Speed Factor
animation_speed_factor.helper: Adjust animation speed multiplier (-3x to 3x). Set 0 to pause; negatives reverse direction.

animation_style.label: Animation Style
animation_style.helper: Choose the flow animation motif (dashes, dots, or arrows).

sensor_pv_total.label: PV Total Sensor
sensor_pv_total.helper: Optional aggregate production sensor displayed as the combined line.

sensor_pv_total_secondary.label: PV Total Sensor (Inverter 2)
sensor_pv_total_secondary.helper: Optional second inverter total; added to the PV total when provided.

solar_array2_activation_helper.label: If PV Total Sensor (Inverter 2) is set or the PV String values are provided, Array 2 will become active and enable the second inverter. You must also enable Daily Production Sensor (Array 2) and Home Load (Inverter 2).

show_pv_strings.label: Show Individual PV Strings
show_pv_strings.helper: Toggle to display the total plus each PV string on separate lines.

sensor_daily.label: Daily Production Sensor (Required)
sensor_daily.helper: Sensor reporting daily production totals. Either the PV total sensor or your PV string arrays need to be specified as a minimum.

sensor_daily_array2.label: Daily Production Sensor (Array 2)
sensor_daily_array2.helper: Sensor reporting daily production totals for Array 2.

sensor_home_load_secondary.label: Home Load (Inverter 2)
sensor_home_load_secondary.helper: Optional house load sensor for the second inverter.

sensor_grid_power.label: Grid Power
sensor_grid_power.helper: Positive/negative grid flow sensor. Specify either this sensor or both Grid Import Sensor and Grid Export Sensor.

sensor_grid_import.label: Grid Import Sensor
sensor_grid_import.helper: Optional entity reporting grid import (positive) power.

sensor_grid_export.label: Grid Export Sensor
sensor_grid_export.helper: Optional entity reporting grid export (positive) power.

sensor_grid_import_daily.label: Daily Grid Import Sensor
sensor_grid_import_daily.helper: Optional entity reporting cumulative grid import for the current day.

sensor_grid_export_daily.label: Daily Grid Export Sensor
sensor_grid_export_daily.helper: Optional entity reporting cumulative grid export for the current day.

show_daily_grid.label: Show Daily Grid
show_daily_grid.helper: Display the daily import/export totals below the grid power value when enabled.

pv_tot_color.label: PV Total Color
pv_tot_color.helper: Colour applied to the PV TOTAL text line.

pv_primary_color.label: PV 1 Flow Color
pv_primary_color.helper: Colour used for the primary PV animation line.

pv_secondary_color.label: PV 2 Flow Color
pv_secondary_color.helper: Colour used for the secondary PV animation line when available.

pv_string1_color.label: PV String 1 Color
pv_string1_color.helper: Override for S1 in the PV list. Leave blank to inherit the PV total color.

pv_string2_color.label: PV String 2 Color
pv_string2_color.helper: Override for S2 in the PV list. Leave blank to inherit the PV total color.

pv_string3_color.label: PV String 3 Color
pv_string3_color.helper: Override for S3 in the PV list. Leave blank to inherit the PV total color.

pv_string4_color.label: PV String 4 Color
pv_string4_color.helper: Override for S4 in the PV list. Leave blank to inherit the PV total color.

pv_string5_color.label: PV String 5 Color
pv_string5_color.helper: Override for S5 in the PV list. Leave blank to inherit the PV total color.

pv_string6_color.label: PV String 6 Color
pv_string6_color.helper: Override for S6 in the PV list. Leave blank to inherit the PV total color.

load_flow_color.label: Load Flow Color
load_flow_color.helper: Colour applied to the home load animation line.

house_total_color.label: House Total Color
house_total_color.helper: Colour applied to the HOUSE TOT text/flow.

inv1_color.label: INV 1 Color
inv1_color.helper: Colour applied to the INV 1 text/flow.

inv2_color.label: INV 2 Color
inv2_color.helper: Colour applied to the INV 2 text/flow.

load_threshold_warning.label: Load Warning Threshold
load_threshold_warning.helper: Change load color when magnitude equals or exceeds this value. Uses the selected display unit.

load_warning_color.label: Load Warning Color
load_warning_color.helper: Hex or CSS color applied at the load warning threshold.

load_threshold_critical.label: Load Critical Threshold
load_threshold_critical.helper: Change load color when magnitude equals or exceeds this value. Uses the selected display unit.

load_critical_color.label: Load Critical Color
load_critical_color.helper: Hex or CSS color applied at the load critical threshold.

battery_charge_color.label: Battery Charge Flow Color
battery_charge_color.helper: Colour used when energy is flowing into the battery.

battery_discharge_color.label: Battery Discharge Flow Color
battery_discharge_color.helper: Colour used when energy is flowing from the battery.

grid_import_color.label: Grid Import Flow Color
grid_import_color.helper: Base colour before thresholds when importing from the grid.

grid_export_color.label: Grid Export Flow Color
grid_export_color.helper: Base colour before thresholds when exporting to the grid.

car_flow_color.label: EV Flow Color
car_flow_color.helper: Colour applied to the electric vehicle animation line.

battery_fill_high_color.label: Battery Fill (Normal) Color
battery_fill_high_color.helper: Liquid fill colour when the battery SOC is above the low threshold.

battery_fill_low_color.label: Battery Fill (Low) Color
battery_fill_low_color.helper: Liquid fill colour when the battery SOC is at or below the low threshold.

battery_fill_low_threshold.label: Battery Low Fill Threshold (%)
battery_fill_low_threshold.helper: Use the low fill colour when SOC is at or below this percentage.

grid_activity_threshold.label: Grid Animation Threshold (W)
grid_activity_threshold.helper: Ignore grid flows whose absolute value is below this wattage before animating.

grid_threshold_warning.label: Grid Warning Threshold
grid_threshold_warning.helper: Change grid color when magnitude equals or exceeds this value. Uses the selected display unit.

grid_warning_color.label: Grid Warning Color
grid_warning_color.helper: Hex or CSS color applied at the warning threshold.

grid_threshold_critical.label: Grid Critical Threshold
grid_threshold_critical.helper: Change grid color when magnitude equals or exceeds this value. Uses the selected display unit.

grid_critical_color.label: Grid Critical Color
grid_critical_color.helper: Hex or CSS color applied at the critical threshold.

invert_grid.label: Invert Grid Values
invert_grid.helper: Enable if import/export polarity is reversed.

invert_battery.label: Invert Battery Values
invert_battery.helper: Enable if charge/discharge polarity is reversed.

car1_label.label: Car 1 Label
car1_label.helper: Text displayed next to the first EV values.

car2_label.label: Car 2 Label
car2_label.helper: Text displayed next to the second EV values.

show_car_soc.label: Show Car 1
show_car_soc.helper: Toggle to render the first EV metrics.

show_car2.label: Show Car 2
show_car2.helper: Enable to render the second EV metrics when sensors are provided.

car_pct_color.label: Car SOC Color
car_pct_color.helper: Hex color for EV SOC text (e.g., #00FFFF).

car2_pct_color.label: Car 2 SOC Color
car2_pct_color.helper: Hex color for second EV SOC text (falls back to Car SOC Color).

car1_name_color.label: Car 1 Name Color
car1_name_color.helper: Color applied to the Car 1 name label.

car2_name_color.label: Car 2 Name Color
car2_name_color.helper: Color applied to the Car 2 name label.

car1_color.label: Car 1 Color
car1_color.helper: Color applied to Car 1 power value.

car2_color.label: Car 2 Color
car2_color.helper: Color applied to Car 2 power value.
